TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Decreases the chance of discovering new resources.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Diminue les chances de découvrir de nouvelles ressources.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verringert die Chance zur Entdeckung von neuen Ressourcen.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Decreases the chance of discovering new resources.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Disminuyen las probabilidades de descubrir nuevos recursos.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the chance of discovering new resources.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Augmente les chances de découvrir de nouvelles ressources.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erhöht die Chance zur Entdeckung von neuen Ressourcen.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the chance of discovering new resources.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Aumentan las probabilidades de descubrir nuevos recursos.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% au taux d'apparition des personnages illustres

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% to heal rate of friendly units within your borders
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% au taux de soin des unités amies à l'intérieur de vos frontières
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% für die Heilungsrate von befreundeten Einheiten innerhalb eurer Grenzen
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% to heal rate of friendly units within your borders
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% a la velocidad de curación de las unidades aliadas dentro de tus fronteras

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% to heal rate of enemy units within your borders
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% au taux de soin des unités ennemies à l'intérieur de vos frontières
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% für die Heilungsrate von feindlichen Einheiten innerhalb eurer Grenzen
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% to heal rate of enemy units within your borders
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% a la velocidad de curación de las unidades enemigas dentro de tus fronteras

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les bénéfices de cette ressource sont cumulatifs.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Los beneficios de este recurso son acumulativos.

TEXT.English: A %s1 in your territory at most at distance %d2 of your city
TEXT.French: A %s1 in your territory at most at distance %d2 of your city
TEXT.German: A %s1 in your territory at most at distance %d2 of your city
TEXT.Italian: A %s1 in your territory at most at distance %d2 of your city
TEXT.Spanish: A %s1 in your territory at most at distance %d2 of your city

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Permette il trasporto aereo di %d1_Num unità [NUM1:terrestre:terrestri] per turno

TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE](aplicado a las unidades en la ciudad)

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod% en défense (sauf contre les unités avec armes à feu)
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod% alla difesa (tranne contro le armi da fuoco)
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod% a la defensa (excepto contra unidades con armas de pólvora)

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] Les unités commencent avec %D1 [NUM1:promotion gratuite:promotions gratuites]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las unidades empiezan con un %D1 de ascenso(s) gratis
[ICON_BULLET]Las nuevas unidades reciben %s1_Change [NUM1:punto de experiencia:puntos de experiencia]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]New Units Receive %s1_Change Experience Points in All Cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les nouvelles unités bénéficient de %s1_Change EXP dans toutes les villes
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Neue Einheiten erhalten %s1_Change Erfahrungspunkte in allen Städten
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Le nuove unità %s1_Change ricevono punti esperienza in tutte le città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las nuevas unidades reciben %s1_Change [NUM1:punto de experiencia:puntos de experiencia] en todas las ciudades

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les nouvelles unités (%s1_UnitName) seront désormais créées avec %s2_Change EXP en plus.
[SPACE]de tous les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1:2_SpclstName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] dans toutes les villes

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Enemy units are %D1% to resist your spells
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les unités ennemies ont %D1% de chance de résister à vos sorts.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Feindliche Einheiten haben eine Wahrscheinlichkeit von %D1% euren Zaubersprüchen zu widerstehen.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Enemy units are %D1% to resist your spells
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Enemy units are %D1% to resist your spells

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Vos unités ont %D1% de chance de résister aux sorts.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Eure Einheiten haben eine Wahrscheinlickeit von %D1% Zaubersprüchen zu widerstehen.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Makes all your units invisible while they are within your borders and not in a city.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Rend toutes vous unités invisibles tant qu'elles se trouvent à l'intérieur de vos frontières et hors des villes
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Alle deine Einheiten sind unsichtbar solange sie sich innerhalb eurer Kulturgrenzen und nicht in einer Stadt aufhalten.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Makes all your units invisible while they are within your borders and not in a city
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Makes all your units invisible while they are within your borders and not in a city

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Negates the effects of Civic Anger for your team
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Annule les effets de la doctrine Colère pour votre équipe
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Unzufriedenheit hat keinen Effekt auf die Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Negates the effects of Civic Anger for your team
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Anula los efectos del principio Cólera en vuestro equipo.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Changes the Plot Radius of the city to %D1
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Change le Rayon de production de la ville de %D1
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Changes the Plot Radius of the city to %D1
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Cambia el Radio de Alcance de la ciudad en %D1

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Removed if the caster leaves the city
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Enlevé si le lanceur quitte la ville
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Wird entfernt wenn der Zauberer die Stadt verlässt
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Removed if the caster leaves the city
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Se elimina si el lanzador abandona la ciudad

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Units in the city are %D1% resistant to magic
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les unités dans la ville ont %D1% de résistance à la magie
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Units in the city are %D1% resistant to magic
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las unidades en la ciudad son un %D1% resistentes a la magia

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Reveals all invisible units within your empire
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Dévoile toutes les unités invisibles présentes sur votre territoire
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Deckt alle unsichtbaren Einheiten innerhalb eurer kulturellen Grenzen auf.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Reveals all invisible units within your empire
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Reveals all invisible units within your empire

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] equal to total unhappiness ([ICON_UNHAPPY]) in the city.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Fournit autant de [ICON_PRODUCTION] qu'il y a de mécontentement total ([ICON_UNHAPPY]) dans la ville.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] equal to total unhappiness ([ICON_UNHAPPY]) in the city.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] equal to total unhappiness ([ICON_UNHAPPY]) in the city.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] equal to total unhappiness ([ICON_UNHAPPY]) in the city.

TEXT.English: %s1_CityName can't carry over [ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow any more. The lost %d2_NumProduction[ICON_PRODUCTION] is converted into %d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD]!
TEXT.French: %s1_CityName ne peut plus reporter le surplus de [ICON_PRODUCTION]. Les %d2_NumProduction[ICON_PRODUCTION] en excédent sont convertis en %d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD]!
TEXT.German: %s1_CityName kann den [ICON_PRODUCTION] überschuss nicht mehr nutzen. Die verlorenen %d2_NumProduction[ICON_PRODUCTION] wurden in %d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD] umgewandelt!

TEXT.English: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "We are angered by some citizens' occupations!"
TEXT.French: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY] : "Nous sommes indignés par les professions de certains citoyens!"
TEXT.German: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "Wir sind von einigen Berufen der Bürger verärgert!"
TEXT.Italian: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "Noi siamo in collera per occupazioni alcuni cittadini!"
TEXT.Spanish: +%d1_Change [ICON_UNHAPPY]: "¡Estamos indignados por las ocupaciones de algunos ciudadanos!"

TEXT.French: +%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY] : "Nous sommes ravis par les emplois de certains citoyens!"
TEXT.German: +%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Die Berufe einiger Bürger machen uns froh!"
TEXT.Italian: +%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Siamo lieti di posti di lavoro da parte dei cittadini!"
TEXT.Spanish: +%d1_Change [ICON_HAPPY]: "¡Estamos muy satisfechos por los trabajos de algunos ciudadanos!"

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Wird sich nicht auf Einheiten deines Teams, neutralen oder feindlichen Einheiten auswirken
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Won't affect team, neutral or enemy units
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Won't affect team, neutral or enemy units

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Cannot be cast after unit has attacked
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Ne peut pas être lancé si l'unité a déjà attaqué ce tour-ci
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann nicht gezaubert werden, wenn die Einheit bereits angegriffen hat
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Cannot be cast after unit has attacked
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Cannot be cast after unit has attacked

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires a unit with [LINK=%s1]%s2_prom[\LINK] promotion in the casters stack
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Doit être sur la même case qu'une unité avec [LINK=%s1]%s2_prom[\LINK]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erfordert eine Einheit mit der Beförderung [LINK=%s1]%s2_prom[\LINK] im Einheitenverband des Zaubernden.

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erfordert eine Einheit mit der Beförderung [LINK=%s1]%s2_prom[\LINK] im Einheitenverband des Zaubernden.

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Requires a unit with [LINK=%s1]%s2_prom[\LINK] promotion in the target stack

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Brings a worthy dead unit back to life
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Brings a worthy dead unit back to life
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Brings a worthy dead unit back to life

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Casting counts as Attacking for the turn
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Le sort compte comme une attaque pour le tour
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Zaubern zählt wie Angreifen in der Runde
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Casting counts as Attacking for the turn
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Casting counts as Attacking for the turn

TEXT.English: You have pillaged %d1_Num [ICON_GOLD] from the capture of %s2_CityName!!! Would you like to keep it?
TEXT.French: Vous avez pillé %d1_Num [ICON_GOLD] en capturant %s2_CityName ! Voulez-vous garder cette ville ?
TEXT.German: Ihr habt durch die Eroberung von %s2_CityName %d1_Num [ICON_GOLD] erbeutet!!! Wollt Ihr die Stadt behalten?
TEXT.Italian: Hai saccheggiato %d1_Num [ICON_GOLD] dalla conquista di %s2_CityName!!! Vuoi mantenerla?
TEXT.Spanish: Habéis saqueado %d1_Num [ICON_GOLD] con la captura de %s2_CityName. ¿Deseáis conservarla?

TEXT.English: A %s1_ImpName has been destroyed by a marauding %s3_civ_adjective %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.French: [NUM1:Un:Une:Des:Des] %s1_ImpName [NUM1:a été détruit:a été détruite:ont été détruits:ont été détruites] par [NUM2:un:une:des:des] %s2_UnitName des forces %s3:4_civ_adjective !
TEXT.Spanish: [NUM1:Un:Una:Unos:Unas] %s1_ImpName [NUM1:ha sido destruido:ha sido destruida:han sido destruidos:han sido destruidas] - %s2_UnitName (%s3_civ_adjective).

TEXT.English: While defending, your %s1_UnitName has killed a %s3_owner_adjective %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.French: En se défendant, votre %s1_UnitName a éliminé [NUM2:un:une:des:des] %s2_EnUName des forces %s3:4_owner_adjective !
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit %s1_UnitName hat während eines Verteidigungsmanövers eine Einheit %s2_EnUName (%s3_owner_adjective) vernichtet!
TEXT.Italian: Difendendo, la tua unità %s1_UnitName ha ucciso l'unità nemica %s2_EnUName (%s3_owner_adjective)!

TEXT.German: Nein, übergebt sie wieder an das %s1:2_CivName
